events.title: Willy Chirino Y Sus Amigos
events.location: Pembroke Pines, Florida, United States Of America
events.description: Willy Chirino Y Sus Amigos at the Charles F. Dodge City Center in Pembroke Pines, FL Visit CharlesFDodgeCityCenter.com for more information. No charge for self-parking in the east side lots. Valet Service is available for most performances at $20 per vehicle. Patrons can find valet parking on the West side of the main entrance. Located at 601 SW City Center Way. Box office hours Thursday - Saturday 10AM - 5PM.
